reviews.review_msg: It would be impossible to take this class and not catch his enthusiasm for Melville and Moby-Dick. Made me and my classmates absolutely fall in love with Melville. Such an excellent teacher.
You need to take at least 1 class with this person before you die.
The person underneath me is probably one of the students that the student 2 posts down was complaining about. Everton is a hero but this was not his finest hour.

I don't know what the person below is talking about. I'm in the same class, and it's not at all as this person describes. Everton is the man! He's one of the best profs I've had at SFU. I think someone is just bitter because they turned in a weak midterm paper.

Heard a lot of great things, so I'm disappointed. This prof can't control discussions and lets students ramble endlessly. Office hours are always full because he's busy giving long private lectures to the weakest students and then runs out of time for people with real paper questions. This class is a mess.
How could you not take a class with Everton if you're an English major? He is just flat out the best there is.
If you see Everton's name on a course outline, take, take, TAKE. His classes are fantastic on all levels, but I highly recommend his 3rd & 4th year courses. Absolutely brilliant man.
